trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee eagerly awaits a delivery of flowers, and slightly less eagerly awaits the return of a friend who may have met a terrible fate.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the flower-picking pixie in the east of Phisor Lran and throw porxies to scare off any threats.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Uin Nee.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I need your help! My friend went to pick flowers a while ago, but no one has seen hide nor hair of them since!
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_002<tab>I suspect it was the work of─ No, it's too soon to say for certain.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_003<tab>The best thing to do is send out a search party, consisting of...well, you of course!

TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_004<tab>You should probably start looking where all the prettiest flowers grow, which would be east of Phisor Lran. And if it's what I think it is, be prepared for an epic encounter that will shake the heavens! Or at least cause them to wobble a bit...
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_000_010<tab>Sorry, but as you can see, I'm rather busy. Or perhaps you're here to help?
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_000_011<tab>Uin Nee was worried about me? I'm quite safe, I assure you! And if anything were to disturb me, these porxies will send them on their merry way!

TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_000_012<tab>But since you've come all the way here, perhaps you could watch my back while I carry on picking flowers? On the off chance that any beasties show, throw one of my adorable companions at them!

TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>If any enemies appear, throw a porxie at them. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the enemy and throw a porxie with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_000_014<tab>Aaaaaaiiieee!

TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_000_015<tab>(-Another Flower-picking Pixie-)That's odd... Did you see another pixie picking flowers here? No? Oh, well. I'll just have to finish the job by myself! Tra-la-la!♪
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_PICKFLOWERPIXIE_100_015<tab>Phew! That should be enough for the time being. So, was there any trouble? No? Jolly good. Thanks for keeping an eye out for me. Ta-ta for now!
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_020<tab>So, you made it back, at least.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Though to be honest, I don't have much hope of ever seeing my friend again. Do you know what happened to them?
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_A1_000_001<tab>You'd better ask the beavers.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_A1_000_002<tab>Some things are best left a mystery.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_A1_000_003<tab>Even when I close my eyes, I can still see the...the beavers.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_023<tab>No, not the beavers! Don't let their appearance fool you; there is no greater evil in all of Il Mheg than those long-toothed horrors.
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_024<tab>That's fine. I'd already jumped to my own conclusions anyway!
TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_025<tab>Oooh! It sounds like you'll be having some fantastic nightmares! If you ever manage to sleep again, that is.

TEXT_BANPIX119_03707_UINNEE_000_026<tab>In any case, it sounds like the flower collection is proceeding apace, and we'll soon be able to decorate Lyhe Mheg with beautiful flowers. And if we have to lose a pixie or three in the process, so be it!
